entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
